author: calvix.
content:
Hello,  We `blox_staking/ssvlabs` switched our `sepolia` eth nodes and validators to a new infrastructure yesterday and since then we fail to get blocks from MEV https://boost-relay-sepolia.flashbots.net - the error from MEV relay is
```
time="2025-04-04T08:03:37.236Z" level=warning msg="failed to get payload from relay after retries" blockHash=0x9e37b660dad4b9a819c88791526b7913963ae612f5c8da206e3b643f66a271ae error="max retries exceeded: HTTP error response: 415" method=getPayload parentHash=0x45bdf2916e8569fa0d70b6d861b5cccdb6431a44c1e621e3ebb96ce9ce3e2326 parsedProposerContentType=application/octet-stream proposerAcceptContentTypes="application/octet-stream;q=1.0,application/json;q=0.9" proposerContentType=application/octet-stream proposerEthConsensusVersion=electra slot=7335018 slotUID=8802b49b-6b10-421d-af11-9e5b1b58d06e url="https://boost-relay-sepolia.flashbots.net/eth/v1/builder/blinded_blocks" userAgent="mev-boost/v1.9-rc3 Lighthouse/v7.0.0-beta.4-0486802" version=v1.9-rc3
``` 
the error `"max retries exceeded: HTTP error response: 415` looks like we hit some IP rate limit or something like that. Is there someone from flashbots who could help with this issue? It was working fine before.

We turned off MEV build blocks for now as it caused missed blocks.

author: parithosh
content: ill flag it in some other chat and in the meantime cc <@388610194608750595>

content:
